meanings.sent1: The sinewless rope snapped easily under the weight.
meanings.sent2: The sinewless kitten struggled to climb the tree.
meanings.sent3: The sinewless rubber band couldn't hold the papers together.
meanings.sent4: His sinewless argument fell apart under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The sinewless fabric tore with the slightest pull.

meanings.sent1: Her sinewless arms couldn't lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The sinewless bridge collapsed under the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent3: The sinewless excuse didn't convince anyone.
meanings.sent4: His sinewless resolve crumbled in the face of temptation.
meanings.sent5: The sinewless plant wilted without proper care.
